title: League not displaying properly
body: I have an Alienware laptop and its not displaying the map icons, afk warning, reconnecting sign, mouse, turret health bars properly.  This has happened a few times on this computer and it only gets fixed after an update.

replies.body: Those weird graphical errors are only fixed when League updates? It seems like some of those League files might be getting damaged somehow so I'd suggest running a quick repair through the client options. Test it in a custom game and let me know if that helps.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=cqV4bfZy,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-07-08T01:06:53.890+0000)
>
> Those weird graphical errors are only fixed when League updates? It seems like some of those League files might be getting damaged somehow so I'd suggest running a quick repair through the client options. Test it in a custom game and let me know if that helps.

I used the gear and the initiate full repair thing before and it didnt fix the issue.  Is there a way i could show a photo of the issue?

Yep! You can use something like Gyazo or Imgur to link me a screenshot of what's going on here. Even better, since that repair wasn't able to help go ahead and shoot that screenshot over to our tech guys in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). They can look deeper into your system than I can here on the boards to see just what is going wrong.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=cqV4bfZy,comment-id=000000010001,timestamp=2017-07-09T02:23:52.904+0000)
>
> Yep! You can use something like Gyazo or Imgur to link me a screenshot of what's going on here. Even better, since that repair wasn't able to help go ahead and shoot that screenshot over to our tech guys in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). They can look deeper into your system than I can here on the boards to see just what is going wrong.

it works now i went into the game again and its in a smaller screen idk what happend

i opend the game again to look at it and it popped up in a smaller screen so its ok now i guess
